definitions.usage: 描述人、动物或活动具有旺盛的体力或热情，通常用于表达积极、高效或充满激情的状态。

examples.scene: 在一个阳光明媚的周末，年轻人在公园里组织了一场足球比赛，球员们在场上跑动、传球，展现出无穷的活力。
examples.chineseIdea: 想要表达球员们在比赛中活力四射，充满热情和动力。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The players were @ @ @ during the intense football match.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The players were 「full of energy」 during the intense football match.
examples.chineseTranslation: 球员们在激烈的足球比赛中「充满活力」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：The players were very energy in the match. 纠正：The players were full of energy during the match.

examples.scene: 在公司年会上，一位年轻的员工自告奋勇上台表演了一段快节奏的街舞，赢得了观众的热烈掌声。
examples.chineseIdea: 想要描述这位员工在表演中展现出极高的活力和感染力。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His dance performance was @ @, captivating the entire audience.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His dance performance was 「 highly energetic 」, captivating the entire audience.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他的舞蹈表演「充满活力」，吸引了全场观众。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：His dance was very power. 纠正：His dance performance was highly energetic.

definitions.usage: 描述行动、方法或风格以充满力量或效率的方式进行，常用于工作、领导或艺术表达等领域。

examples.scene: 在一家初创公司，团队负责人总是以饱满的热情激励员工，推动项目快速前进。
examples.chineseIdea: 想要表达负责人通过积极的方式激励团队，推动工作高效进行。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Her @ @ to team management inspired everyone to work harder.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Her 「energetic approach」 to team management inspired everyone to work harder.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她对团队管理的「积极方式」激励了每个人更加努力工作。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：Her management was very energy. 纠正：Her energetic approach to management was inspiring.

examples.scene: 在一场音乐会上，主唱用充满力量的演唱和舞台表现点燃了全场气氛。
examples.chineseIdea: 想要描述主唱的表演充满力量，极具感染力。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The lead singer delivered an @ @ that left the crowd cheering.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The lead singer delivered an 「energetic performance」 that left the crowd cheering.
examples.chineseTranslation: 主唱献上的「充满力量的表演」让观众欢呼不已。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：The singer’s show was very strong energy. 纠正：The singer delivered an energetic performance.
